nodes.excerpt: Firework brings the TikTok/IG/Snap Story experience into any Website or any app. Raised $55M in Series A, we aim to unite the open internet (decentralized and open) to fight against the giant social media (centralized and closed)

nodes.author: Vincent Yang

localize.description: Firework将TikTok/IG/Snap Story的体验带入任何网站或任何应用。A轮融资5500万美元，我们的目标是联合开放的互联网（去中心化和开放）来对抗巨大的社交媒体（中心化和封闭）。
localize.tagline: TikTok的B2B版本

localize.description: Firework將TikTok/IG/Snap Story的體驗帶入任何網站或任何應用。A輪融資5500萬美元，我們的目標是聯合開放的互聯網（去中心化和開放）來對抗巨大的社交媒體（中心化和封閉）。
localize.tagline: TikTok的B2B版本

localize.tagline: 通过现实生活中的任务实现开发招聘的自动化。

nodes.excerpt: 📈HireBeat for Employers is an automated interview screening platform that saves employers time 🕗 and money💰! HireBeat delivers one-way interview invitations that allow the employer to review & evaluate candidate performance anytime, anywhere.
nodes.title: HireBeat - Automated interview platform that accelerates hiring process
nodes.author: Ning Wei

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一个自动面试筛选平台，为雇主节省时间🕗和金钱💰! HireBeat提供单向面试邀请，让雇主随时随地审查和评估候选人的表现。
localize.tagline: 自动面试平台，加速招聘流程。

localize.description: 📈HireBeat for Employers是一個自動面試篩選平臺，爲僱主節省時間🕗和金錢💰! HireBeat提供單向面試邀請，讓僱主隨時隨地審查和評估候選人的表現。
localize.tagline: 自動面試平臺，加速招聘流程。

nodes.excerpt: 🎨 Create and manage personalized subscription plans 🎯 Test and optimize your pricing model to increase your conversion 🧩 Use the direct link to your subscription page or embed it on your website 😱 All that without coding.

localize.description: 🎨 创建和管理个性化的订阅计划 🎯 测试和优化您的定价模型，以提高您的转换 🧩 使用直接链接到您的订阅页面或将其嵌入您的网站 😱 所有这些都无需编码。
localize.tagline: 通过有效的订阅计划获得新客户。

nodes.excerpt: They are perfect to be used in email to redirect iOS users to the app store, android users to the play store and for those that uses a computer, you can redirect them to your web app. And those users we can not match, they will be sent do your default url.
nodes.title: Kameleont - Create dynamic links that redirects based on device or OS
nodes.author: Jonathan Andersson

localize.description: 他们是完美的被用于在电子邮件中重定向iOS用户到应用商店，安卓用户到Play商店和那些使用电脑，你可以重定向他们到你的Web应用程序。而那些我们无法匹配的用户，他们将被发送到做你的默认网址。
localize.tagline: 创建动态链接，根据设备或操作系统重定向。

localize.tagline: 創建動態鏈接，根據設備或操作系統重定向。

nodes.excerpt: Filter bubbles impair our ability to communicate with others and threaten our sense of reality. However, many people don't know they are in one! Blindspotter analyzes your news interactions on Twitter and lets you know if you have a blindspot, left or right.
nodes.title: Blindspotter - Visualize your news blindspots
nodes.author: Harleen Kaur

localize.description: 过滤器气泡损害了我们与他人沟通的能力，威胁到我们的现实感。然而，许多人不知道他们是在一个! Blindspotter分析你在Twitter上的新闻互动，让你知道你是否有盲点，左或右。
localize.tagline: 将您的新闻盲点可视化

localize.description: 過濾器氣泡損害了我們與他人溝通的能力，威脅到我們的現實感。然而，許多人不知道他們是在一個! Blindspotter分析你在Twitter上的新聞互動，讓你知道你是否有盲點，左或右。
localize.tagline: 將您的新聞盲點可視化

nodes.excerpt: Paid Rooms lets you host paywalled private clubhouse rooms. Set one up in less than 30 seconds, simply: 1) Sign up with your phone number 2) Enter your room details 3) Share it an get paid 💰

localize.tagline: 会所房间收费$$$

nodes.excerpt: Showwcase is a social network built and optimised for developers. Developers can connect, share their knowledge and showcase their projects with like-minded individuals. For developer content creators, you can make money via paid subscribers.
nodes.title: Showwcase - A social network for developers that lets you make money
nodes.author: Rong Liew

localize.description: Showwcase是一个为开发者构建和优化的社交网络。开发者可以连接， 与志同道合的人分享他们的知识和展示他们的项目。对于开发者内容创造者来说，你可以通过付费用户赚钱。
localize.tagline: 一个让你赚钱的开发者社交网络。

localize.description: Showwcase是一個爲開發者構建和優化的社交網絡。開發者可以連接， 與志同道合的人分享他們的知識和展示他們的項目。對於開發者內容創造者來說，你可以通過付費用戶賺錢。
localize.tagline: 一個讓你賺錢的開發者社交網絡。

nodes.excerpt: Bankiom is kind of Expedia for your money Track all your money Send money like texting Grow your wealth like a pro in a fun way Your mission if you choose to accept it is to catch our bugs & provide your feedback Let’s change the world one account at a time!
nodes.title: Bankiom - Smart online banking app to connect your money to your dream
nodes.author: Aguu

localize.description: Bankiom是一种为你的钱而设的Expedia 追踪你所有的钱 像发短信一样发钱 以一种有趣的方式像专业人员一样增长你的财富 如果你选择接受它，你的任务是抓住我们的错误和提供你的反馈 让我们一次改变一个账户的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能网银应用，让你的钱和梦想连接起来。

localize.description: Bankiom是一種爲你的錢而設的Expedia 追蹤你所有的錢 像發短信一樣發錢 以一種有趣的方式像專業人員一樣增長你的財富 如果你選擇接受它，你的任務是抓住我們的錯誤和提供你的反饋 讓我們一次改變一個賬戶的世界!
localize.tagline: 智能網銀應用，讓你的錢和夢想連接起來。

nodes.excerpt: You know how gradients are trendy, but adding a slight noise filter or grain to them is even trendier? Well now you don't have to crack open photoshop to get that effect with your own colors. Just go to noiseandgradient.com!
nodes.title: Noise and Gradient - Generate trendy textures of your own, for free
nodes.author: clara 🕶

localize.description: 你知道渐变是多么时髦，但给它们添加轻微的噪点滤镜或颗粒更时髦？好了，现在你不用打开photoshop就能用自己的颜色得到这种效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免费生成您自己的时尚纹理。

localize.description: 你知道漸變是多麼時髦，但給它們添加輕微的噪點濾鏡或顆粒更時髦？好了，現在你不用打開photoshop就能用自己的顏色得到這種效果。只要去 noiseandgradient.com!
localize.tagline: 免費生成您自己的時尚紋理。

nodes.excerpt: VS Code Theme Studio enables you to quickly and easily design your own VS Code theme in an intuitive, user-friendly, web-based interface. No more messing around with nasty JSON files, editing raw hex color codes, and tweaking settings.
nodes.title: VS Code Theme Studio - Create your own VS Code theme easily, within your browser
nodes.author: Mike Tromba

localize.description: VS Code Theme Studio可以让你在一个直观的、用户友好的、基于网络的界面中快速、轻松地设计自己的VS Code主题。无需再使用讨厌的JSON文件，编辑原始的十六进制颜色代码，以及调整设置。
localize.tagline: 在浏览器中轻松创建自己的VS Code主题。

localize.description: VS Code Theme Studio可以讓你在一個直觀的、用戶友好的、基於網絡的界面中快速、輕鬆地設計自己的VS Code主題。無需再使用討厭的JSON文件，編輯原始的十六進制顏色代碼，以及調整設置。
localize.tagline: 在瀏覽器中輕鬆創建自己的VS Code主題。

nodes.excerpt: What if programming was about ideas, not semicolons? Compose, abstract, generalise. Start from top down or bottom up and refine as you go. With Nodes, programming feels like sketching on a canvas.
nodes.title: Nodes - Thinking space for exploring ideas with code
nodes.author: Sonu Jung

localize.description: 如果编程是关于思想，而不是分号呢？组成、抽象、概括。从自上而下或自下而上开始，边走边完善。有了 Nodes，编程感觉就像在画布上画草图。
localize.tagline: 用代码探索思想的思维空间

localize.description: 如果編程是關於思想，而不是分號呢？組成、抽象、概括。從自上而下或自下而上開始，邊走邊完善。有了 Nodes，編程感覺就像在畫布上畫草圖。
localize.tagline: 用代碼探索思想的思維空間

nodes.excerpt: Connect your SQL database to Clay to insert your query results directly in Google Sheets. Goodbye to hopping between SQL editors, CSV downloads, Excel, and Dashboards. Have your financial models, growth charts, and customer lists always up to date!
nodes.title: ClaySQL - Run SQL queries directly in Google Sheets
nodes.author: Jordan Banafsheha

localize.description: 将您的SQL数据库连接到Clay，直接在Google Sheets中插入您的查询结果。告别在SQL编辑器、CSV下载、Excel和Dashboards之间跳来跳去。让你的财务模型、增长图表和客户名单始终保持最新。
localize.tagline: 直接在Google Sheets中运行SQL查询

localize.description: 將您的SQL數據庫連接到Clay，直接在Google Sheets中插入您的查詢結果。告別在SQL編輯器、CSV下載、Excel和Dashboards之間跳來跳去。讓你的財務模型、增長圖表和客戶名單始終保持最新。
localize.tagline: 直接在Google Sheets中運行SQL查詢

nodes.excerpt: Stackby is a collaborative workspace that brings ease of use of spreadsheets, functionality of databases and access to popular services via no-code API connectors - to create, organize and automate anything.
nodes.title: Stackby - Spreadsheet, databases, and no-code APIs in one platform
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: Stackby是一个协作式工作空间，它带来了电子表格的易用性、数据库的功能以及通过无代码API连接器对流行服务的访问--以创建、组织和自动化任何东西。
localize.tagline: 在一个平台上提供电子表格、数据库和无代码API。

localize.description: Stackby是一個協作式工作空間，它帶來了電子表格的易用性、數據庫的功能以及通過無代碼API連接器對流行服務的訪問--以創建、組織和自動化任何東西。
localize.tagline: 在一個平臺上提供電子表格、數據庫和無代碼API。

nodes.excerpt: Vantage is a cloud cost transparency platform currently supporting AWS. Securely link your AWS account in a click of a button and we'll automatically show you where your costs are coming from and how they're trending.
nodes.title: Vantage - A cloud cost transparency platform
nodes.author: Ben Schaechter

localize.description: Vantage是一个云成本透明平台，目前支持AWS。只需点击一个按钮，就能安全地链接你的AWS账户，我们会自动向你展示你的成本来自哪里，以及成本的趋势。
localize.tagline: 云成本透明平台

localize.description: Vantage是一個雲成本透明平臺，目前支持AWS。只需點擊一個按鈕，就能安全地鏈接你的AWS賬戶，我們會自動向你展示你的成本來自哪裏，以及成本的趨勢。
localize.tagline: 雲成本透明平臺

nodes.excerpt: Focus on one important task today. You decide what to focus on. After you set today's task you can't change or delete it. Keep a streak of days you finished your daily task.

localize.description: 今天专注于一项重要任务。你决定专注于什么。当你设定了今天的任务后，你就不能更改或删除它。保持你完成每日任务的天数的连贯性。
localize.tagline: 今天的一项任务

localize.description: 今天專注於一項重要任務。你決定專注於什麼。當你設定了今天的任務後，你就不能更改或刪除它。保持你完成每日任務的天數的連貫性。
localize.tagline: 今天的一項任務

nodes.excerpt: Discover the power of Walling and kickstart your next project with the new Walling templates. No complex workflows. No wasted hours setting up random templates that don't work. With Walling, it is simple, just put it on a wall! Start a new wall: https://wall.new

nodes.excerpt: Uranus - Wireframe Kit is a Premium wireframing pack with more than 140+ dark/light ready-to-use web elements/sections. The basement idea of this kit was started from the wireframing time problem! 🔥 Will be available in Sketch, Adobe Xd & Code format soon.

nodes.excerpt: Don't keep your audience waiting for a follow-up email! Sharing slides or resources has never been easier. Upload your content, add your custom QR code to any presentation and streamline sharing. ****Currently free for all early access users****

nodes.author: James Quinn

localize.description: 不要让你的听众等待后续的电子邮件! 分享幻灯片或资源从未如此简单。上传您的内容，将您的自定义二维码添加到任何演示文稿中，并简化共享。目前所有早期用户均可免费使用****。
localize.tagline: 轻松分享演示文稿和资源

localize.description: 不要讓你的聽衆等待後續的電子郵件! 分享幻燈片或資源從未如此簡單。上傳您的內容，將您的自定義二維碼添加到任何演示文稿中，並簡化共享。目前所有早期用戶均可免費使用****。

nodes.excerpt: Think of Speeko like a gym membership for your voice. Get instant feedback on your speaking style, and track your progress over time. Personalized activities help you build new skills in just 5 minutes a day. You'll be speaking with confidence in no time!
nodes.title: Speeko - A.I. powered public speaking and presenter coach
nodes.author: Nico Aguilar

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的声音的健身会员。您可以获得关于您的口语风格的即时反馈，并随着时间的推移追踪您的进步。个性化的活动帮助您在每天5分钟内培养新技能。您很快就会变得自信满满。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.动力公共演讲和主持人教练)

localize.description: 想想看，Speeko就像您的聲音的健身會員。您可以獲得關於您的口語風格的即時反饋，並隨着時間的推移追蹤您的進步。個性化的活動幫助您在每天5分鐘內培養新技能。您很快就會變得自信滿滿。
localize.tagline: A.I.Powered Public Speaking and presenter coach (A.I.動力公共演講和主持人教練)

nodes.excerpt: Engineering time is valuable, and securing your application flows can be challenging and time consuming. With OTPfy you can secure any part of your application with ease without wasting any more time and resources.
nodes.title: OTPfy - Secure your apps with magic links and one time passwords
nodes.author: Alex Casillas

localize.description: 工程时间是宝贵的，而保护您的应用流程是具有挑战性和耗时性的。有了OTPfy，您可以轻松地保护您应用程序的任何部分，而无需浪费更多的时间和资源。
localize.tagline: 使用魔法链接和一次性密码保护您的应用程序。

localize.description: 工程時間是寶貴的，而保護您的應用流程是具有挑戰性和耗時性的。有了OTPfy，您可以輕鬆地保護您應用程序的任何部分，而無需浪費更多的時間和資源。
localize.tagline: 使用魔法鏈接和一次性密碼保護您的應用程序。
